name: Mark Zukerbarg
comment: Looks like a scam. In the end I am without order and without money. Seller is very bad and unpleasant. You almost got sent byâ€¦ don't buy here.  They practically stole money and don't want to do anything.

name: Bill Gates
comment: This was 50$ cheaper then official price. I had doubts whether its a copy or original. So far looks okay to me but paint got scratched easily on the very first day if installing.

name: Warren Buffett
comment: It's taken a while to arrive, exact description.Salesman is ignoring me. TS just close my disputes. A scam. They take money from you and don't do their job.

name: Larry Page
comment: Well-packed product, arrived almost 3 weeks, fully steel product, resistant, recommend 10/10, fully meets desired expectations

name: Sergey Brin
comment: Very bad I don't have my order. I don't have money back. I have No help with request. Salesman is ignoring me. TS just close my disputes. A scam. They take money from you and don't do their job.

name: Gautam Adani
comment: Item shipped with two days delay. Tracked on the delivery way. I came to the national team. Quality is excellent. On the tripod became like a native. The performance is neat. Recommend.
